00031 cimunit_event_list_t *cimunit_event_list_init() {
00032     return NULL;

00036 void cimunit_event_list_destroy(cimunit_event_list_t **list) {
00037     cimunit_event_list_t *event_entry_to_delete;
00038     cimunit_event_list_t *next_event_entry = *list;
00039     
00040     while (NULL != next_event_entry) {
00041         event_entry_to_delete = next_event_entry;
00042         next_event_entry = next_event_entry->next;
00043         free(event_entry_to_delete);
00044     }
00045     
00046     *list = NULL;
00047 }

00050 void cimunit_event_list_add(cimunit_event_list_t **list,
00051                             struct cimunit_event *event) {
00052     cimunit_event_list_t *new_entry = malloc(sizeof(cimunit_event_list_t));
00053 
00054     // Insert new entry at the head of the list
00055     new_entry->event = event;
00056     new_entry->next = *list;
00057     *list = new_entry;
00058 }

00061 void cimunit_event_list_union(cimunit_event_list_t **list,
00062                               cimunit_event_list_t *list2) {
00063     cimunit_event_list_t *data = list2;
00064     while (data != NULL) {
00065         if (NULL == cimunit_event_list_find(*list, data->event->event_name)) {
00066             cimunit_event_list_add(list, data->event);
00067         }
00068         data = data->next;
00069     }
00070 }

00073 struct cimunit_event *cimunit_event_list_find_with_thread(
00074   cimunit_event_list_t *list, const char *name, const char *thread) {
00075     cimunit_event_list_t *entry = list;
00076     // If no thread was provided, any event with the specified name will match
00077     if (NULL == thread) {
00078         while (NULL != entry) {
00079             if ((NULL == entry->event->thread_name) &&
00080                 (strcmp(name, entry->event->event_name) == 0)) {
00081                 return entry->event;
00082             }
00083             entry = entry->next;
00084         }
00085     } else {
00086         // Find event with matching thread name
00087         while (entry != NULL) {
00088             if ((strcmp(name, entry->event->event_name) == 0) &&
00089                 (NULL != entry->event->thread_name)) {
00090                 if (strcmp(thread, entry->event->thread_name) == 0) {
00091                     return entry->event;
00092                 }
00093             }
00094             entry = entry->next;
00095         }
00096     }    
00097     return NULL;
00098 }
00099 
00100 
00101 struct cimunit_event *cimunit_event_list_find(cimunit_event_list_t *list,
00102                                               const char *name) {
00103     return cimunit_event_list_find_with_thread(list, name, NULL);
00104 }
